text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Dear President Trump, 
We appreciate all ur effort in containing covid-19 in america and ur fight all over the world especially in ending the terror of ISIS and BOKO HARAM in Africa,pls use FBI,CIAHOMELAND on Joe Biden son. After u let your Vice President be the next President
